text: @realDonaldTrump Law & Order is a TV show. This is real life. You’re fucking with people’s lives. Your actions are hurting your citizens. Do what’s right, asshole. We know you started the coronavirus outbreak for the sake of declaring a national emergency and postponing your impeachment, anyways.
